| HistoryText             = A group of special Hyper-[[Zola's Mutates|Mutates]] created by [[Arnim Zola (Earth-616)|Arnim Zola]] to especially combat the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]],{{r|Captain America Vol 7 23}} who they engaged{{r|Captain America Vol 7 24}} but were ultimately defeated by. [[Sharon Carter (Earth-616)|Sharon Carter]] claimed that [[Jet Zola (Earth-616)|Jet Zola]] stole the other Avengers' DNA ([[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]], [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] and [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]]), giving it to his father.{{r|Captain America Vol 7 25}}
